mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.chongwuyongpin_name as chongwuyongpinName ,a.chongwuyongpin_uuid_number as chongwuyongpinUuidNumber ,a.chongwuyongpin_photo as chongwuyongpinPhoto ,a.chongwuyongpin_types as chongwuyongpinTypes ,a.chongwuyongpin_kucun_number as chongwuyongpinKucunNumber ,a.chongwuyongpin_old_money as chongwuyongpinOldMoney ,a.chongwuyongpin_new_money as chongwuyongpinNewMoney ,a.chongwuyongpin_clicknum as chongwuyongpinClicknum ,a.chongwuyongpin_content as chongwuyongpinContent ,a.shangxia_types as shangxiaTypes ,a.chongwuyongpin_delete as chongwuyongpinDelete ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
